title: Trump Organization Is Said to Be in Talks on a Saudi Government Real Estate Deal
summary: The chief executive of a Saudi firm says a Trump-branded project is “just a matter of time.” The Trump Organization’s major foreign partner is also signaling new Saudi deals.

title: U.S. Border Patrol Launches Operation in Charlotte, N.C.
summary: It is unclear how long the operation will last in North Carolina’s largest city, which has a growing immigrant population.

title: Former Fed Official Violated Trading Rules, Disclosures Show
summary: Adriana D. Kugler, who stepped down as a governor in August, reported trades in stocks, including Apple and Southwest Airlines, in 2024.

title: A Tiny West Wing Office Is Big on Trump Messaging
summary: The Oval Office study has become a room for Trump merchandise.

title: Gallego Pitches Demoralized Democrats on a Midterm Message
summary: At a health care town hall in his swing state, Senator Ruben Gallego, Democrat of Arizona, test-drove his party’s new political pitch to an audience disappointed in the outcome of the shutdown.

title: Fetterman Is Released From the Hospital After a Fall
summary: The Pennsylvania senator was hospitalized on Thursday after he fell during a morning walk near his home in Braddock, Pa. He required 20 stitches.

title: Once He Was ‘Just Asking Questions.’ Now Tucker Carlson Is the Question.
summary: The conservative commentator has further fractured the right with his anti-Israel rhetoric and sympathy for a white nationalist. He’s not in the mood to apologize.

title: What’s More Dangerous than India’s Frequent Heat Waves? Heat Stress.
summary: Women who face long-term heat exposure in workplaces and homes are finding it takes a heavy toll on their health and income.

title: How Many People Die in India From Hot Weather? Nobody Really Knows.
summary: Officials have yet to grasp the magnitude of heat-related deaths, let alone effectively deal with the problem, public health experts and scientists say.

title: Storm Pounds Southern California With Heavy Rains and Some Flooding
summary: Evacuation orders were lifted in Los Angeles County after an unusually powerful storm brought heavy rain and prompted concerns about mudslides. At least two deaths were linked to the storm.

title: The Laptop That Ate Your Child’s Classroom
summary: Asking students to drill down on their schoolwork amid an array of digital distractions is inimical to learning.

title: Adam Sandler Is the Light We Need
summary: When I took my dad to see Adam Sandler live, I expected to laugh. We both got so much more.

title: Displaced Gazans Face More Misery as Torrential Rain Lashes Enclave
summary: Heavy rainfall and chilling winds have added to the challenges facing people still forced to live in tents in the devastated territory.

title: 4 Dead After Suspected Migrant Boat Overturns Near a San Diego Area Beach
summary: The boat capsized off the coast, officials said. Four people were taken to a hospital and one person was taken into custody.

title: Alice Wong, Writer and Relentless Advocate for Disability Rights, Dies at 51
summary: Born with muscular dystrophy, she received a MacArthur “Genius” grant in 2024 for her decades of calling attention to the need for equal rights for disabled people.
